title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.12 - Form employed for emergency procurement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.12 - Form employed for emergency procurement

State Regulations

The State director acting for the commission, shall have
printed and distributed to local directors, State Civil Defense Commission form

No. 1 in triplicate, "Order for Emergency Materials, Supplies, Facilities or

Services". This form shall be employed by local directors concerned in an
attack either as a purchase order or requisition (taking) for all bulk or other
emergency materials, supplies, equipment, facilities and lodging procured by
them in the name of the State during the acute emergency period. Other local
directors not involved in an attack shall similarly employ State Civil Defense

Commission form No. 1 for emergency procurement pursuant to section
516.3
of this Part when instructed to make such procurement by the State director, acting for the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
506.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
